headline: CarMax Stock Falls 20% on Earnings. Why It’s a Warning for the Auto Sector.
summary: FEATURE  Shares of CarMax plummeted on Thursday after the used-car retailer shocked investors, reporting weaker-than-expected quarterly earnings. It’s a warning for investors that car markets might be weakening after a period of unexpected strength.

headline: Ford names new labor affairs leader who brings Boeing, Microsoft experience to job
summary: Mike Fitzsimmons succeeds Kevin Legel, who served as Ford's head of labor affairs for 32 years.

raw.headline: Ford names new labor affairs leader who brings Boeing, Microsoft experience to job

headline: Auto Industry Is Flashing a Warning Sign on U.S. Economy
summary: CarMax, the biggest seller of used cars, said that sales and profits plunged in the latest quarter. Its shares dropped as much as 25% on the news.

raw.headline: Auto Industry Is Flashing a Warning Sign on U.S. Economy
raw.summary: CarMax, the biggest seller of used cars, said that sales and profits plunged in the latest quarter. Its shares dropped as much as 25% on the news.

headline: CarMax Stock Falls 22% on Earnings. Why It’s a Warning for the Auto Sector.
summary: Shares of  CarMax  were plummeting Thursday after the used-car retailer shocked investors, reporting weaker-than-expected quarterly earnings.  The average retail selling price fell 1% to $25,993 from $26,245.  Shares of  CarMax  were down almost 22% on Thursday at $44.49, putting the stock on pace for its largest single-day decline since Sept. 29, 2022.

raw.headline: CarMax Stock Falls 22% on Earnings. Why It’s a Warning for the Auto Sector.

The average retail selling price fell 1% to $25,993 from $26,245.  Shares of  CarMax  were down almost 22% on Thursday at $44.49, putting the stock on pace for its largest single-day decline since Sept. 29, 2022.

headline: Ford initiates safety recall for steering issue in over 115,000 vehicles in US
summary: The affected vehicles include the 2020-2021 Ford F-Super Duty trucks, encompassing the F-250, F-350, and F-450 models.

raw.headline: Ford initiates safety recall for steering issue in over 115,000 vehicles in US
raw.summary: The affected vehicles include the 2020-2021 Ford F-Super Duty trucks, encompassing the F-250, F-350, and F-450 models.

headline: Ford establishes new subsidiary in China
summary: New company will overlook sales, marketing and aftersales operations in the country.
